subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For fans who want to attend specific high-profile games at Shea Stadium this year but do not have season tickets or a multigame ticket package that includes those games, buying a ticket has become a matter of chance.
snippet: For fans who want to attend specific high-profile games at Shea Stadium this year but do not have season tickets or a multigame ticket package that includes those games, buying a ticket has become a matter of chance.
